metadata.title: CVE-2024-41033 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:cachestat: do not flush stats in recency checksyzbot detects that cachestat() is flushing stats, which can sleep, in itsRCU read section (see [1]).  This is done in the workingset_test_recent()step (which checks if the folio's eviction is recent).Move the stat flushing step to before the RCU read section of cachestat,and skip stat flushing during the recency check.[1]:https://lore.kernel.org/cgroups/000000000000f71227061bdf97e0@google.com/
